definitions.text: vegetation (such as young shoots, twigs, and leaves) that is suitable for animals to eat
examples: a deer needs to eat twenty pounds of browse every day

definitions.text: the act of feeding by continual nibbling

examples: I don't need help, I'm just browsing

definitions.text: feed as in a meadow or pasture
look around casually and randomly, without seeking anything in particular
examples: surf the internet or the world wide web
There was so much food at the party that we quickly got sated just by browsing
